file_content.text: Are you sure you want to continue with this choice?
This choice will kill Provost Marshal Rusk and make him permanently unavailable. Are you sure you want to proceed?
This choice will kill Skadge and make him permanently unavailable. Are you sure you want to proceed?
This choice will make Skadge permanently unavailable. Are you sure you want to proceed?
Proceed with this transaction?
This choice will end your hunt and you will no longer be able to turn trophies in to Qyzen Fess.

Using this terminal will have no impact on your story. Canonically speaking, your former companions will still be elsewhere in the galaxy until they return as part of future story events.
Do you still wish to proceed?
Are you sure you wish to unlock this companion?
This choice will begin a romance with Lana Beniko. Are you sure you want to proceed?
This choice will begin a romance with Theron Shan. Are you sure you want to proceed?
This choice will begin a romance with Koth Vortena. Are you sure you want to proceed?
This choice will greatly anger Zenith and make him permanently unavailable. Are you sure you want to proceed?
Transaction Error
Not enough credits to complete transaction.
Not enough influence to complete transaction.
Missing required item(s) to complete transaction.
Not enough space in inventory to complete transaction.
This choice will reject Xalek as a companion, likely making him permanently unavailable. Are you sure you wish to proceed?
You have chosen to kill Xalek. This will make him permanently unavailable. Are you sure you wish to proceed?
You have chosen to reject Lokin as a companion. This will likely make him permanently unavailable. Are you sure you wish to proceed?
You have chosen to reject this companion, This will likely make them permanently unavailable. Are you sure you wish to proceed?
You have chosen to kill this companion. This will make them permanently unavailable. Are you sure you wish to proceed?
This choice will resume your romance with Aric Jorgan. Are you sure you want to proceed?
This choice will end your romance with Aric Jorgan. Are you sure you want to proceed?
This choice will resume your romance with Kaliyo Djannis. Doing so will end any other romances you may be involved in. Are you sure you want to proceed?
This choice will end your romance with Kaliyo Djannis. Are you sure you want to proceed?
Are you sure you wish to kill this companion?
Reminder: Zenith holds a deep-seated hatred of the Empire. If you do not choose your words VERY carefully, Zenith may reject you outright, without warning, and become permanently unavailable.
This choice will resume your romance with Vette. Doing so will end any other romances you may be involved in. Are you sure you want to proceed?
This choice will end your romance with Vette. Are you sure you want to proceed?
This choice will resume your romance with Torian Cadera. Doing so will end any other romances you may be involved in. Are you sure you want to proceed?
This choice will end your romance with Torian Cadera. Are you sure you want to proceed?
This choice will make Guss permanently unavailable. Are you sure you want to proceed?
This choice will make Broonmark permanently unavailable. Are you sure you want to proceed?
This choice will kill Broonmark and make him permanently unavailable. Are you sure you want to proceed?

Using this terminal will have no impact on your story. Canonically speaking, your former companions will still be dead or unavailable.
Do you still wish to proceed?

Using this terminal will have no impact on your story. Your choices will still be remembered, and companions who are dead or lost will still be absent from the story.
Do you still wish to proceed?

You will need to use your wits if you're going to infiltrate Vaylin's palace and sabotage the security relays.
Explore the environment, search for clues, and talk to people within the palace. If you need help, use the "Hint" ability.
This choice will resume your romance with Malavai Quinn. Doing so will end any other romances you may be involved in. Are you sure you want to proceed?
This choice will resume your romance with Elara Dorne. Doing so will end any other romances you may be involved in. Are you sure you want to proceed?
This choice will end your romance with Malavai Quinn. Are you sure you want to proceed?
This choice will end your romance with Elara Dorne. Are you sure you want to proceed?

Doing this will restore Elara Dorne to whatever you chose during the Iokath arc. If you recruited her, she will be restored. If you drove her away, she will be known, but unavailable. To bring her back from that, use the Companion Locator Terminal again.

Doing this will restore Malavai Quinn to whatever you chose during the Iokath arc. If you recruited him, he will be restored. If you drove him away, he will be known, but unavailable. If you chose to kill him, he will be listd as dead. To bring him back from that, use the Companion Locator Terminal again.
This choice will end your romance with Raina Temple. Are you sure you want to proceed?
This choice will resume your romance with Raina Temple. Doing so will end any other romances you may be involved in. Are you sure you want to proceed?

This choice will end your romance with Doc. Are you sure you want to proceed?

This choice will start your romance with Nadia Grell. Doing so will end any other romances you may be involved in. Are you sure you want to proceed?

This choice will make Khem Val permanently unavailable. Are you sure you want to proceed?
This choice will start your romance with Khem Val. Doing so will end any other romances you may be involved in. Are you sure you want to proceed?

Begining this quest will automatically complete any uncompleted quests in your class story, Shadow of Revan, Knights of the Fallen Empire, Knights of the Eternal Throne, and Fractured Alliances content. Romance options for any returned companions will not be set and your story will continue with default choices for those stories. Are you sure you wish to proceed?
